title: Applicant Details Input and AI Quotation Generation
description: Verify that the account manager can input applicant details correctly and the system generates an AI-powered quotation including overlimit notifications when applicable.

steps.description: Login as account manager and navigate to new applicant entry form
Input applicant details including company info, contact info, and risk parameters
Submit the form to trigger AI quotation calculation
Check that an AI-generated quotation is returned with accurate fee calculations
Verify that the system triggers an overlimit notification if quotation exceeds predefined thresholds

title: Quote Signing and Workflow Trigger
description: Ensure the applicant can receive a quote via email, digitally sign it, and that signing triggers the next workflow steps.

steps.description: Simulate sending quote email to applicant
Applicant opens the email and accesses the quote signing interface
Applicant applies digital signature and submits the signed quote
Check that the workflow proceeds to 'Facility Application' step after quote signing
Verify that a notification is sent to account and risk managers about quote signing

title: Facility Application Form Availability Post Quotation Approval
description: Check that facility application forms are only emailed and available for applicant completion after quotation approval.

steps.description: Approve the quotation as a manager
Validate that facility application email is triggered to the applicant
Attempt to access facility application forms before quotation approval
Confirm that access to application forms is denied before approval
Access facility application forms after approval
Verify that forms are accessible and editable by the applicant

title: Mandate Determination and Parallel Workflow Branching
description: Verify mandate type determination triggers correct parallel workflow branches for procurement checks and document submission.

steps.description: Submit facility application with mandate information
System correctly determines mandate type based on application data
Workflow splits into parallel paths: procurement check with risk manager review and mandate document submission
Complete each parallel path and submit results
Verify that workflow waits for both parallel branches to complete before proceeding

title: AI Analysis of Submitted Documents and Aggregation of Results
description: Ensure AI analyzes all submitted documents for bank validation, risk assessment, and sanction screening, then aggregates results for final manager review.

steps.description: Applicant submits mandated documents after parallel workflow step
Trigger AI analysis service to process submitted documents
Verify AI correctly performs bank validation, risk checks, and sanction screening on each document
Confirm aggregation service compiles AI findings into comprehensive review report
Ensure final aggregated results are available and visible to risk managers

title: Final Risk Manager Review and Approval Workflow
description: Test that risk managers can perform final review with options to approve or deny application, triggering appropriate workflow next steps or denial paths.

steps.description: Login as risk manager and access final review queue
Review aggregated AI analysis and submitted contract/forms
Select 'Approve' and submit decision
Verify workflow advances to contract and ABSA form submission step
Repeat review and select 'Deny' option
Check that workflow immediately terminates and denial notifications are sent to applicant and managers

title: Contract and ABSA Form Submission Post-Final Approval
description: Confirm account manager can upload contracts and ABSA forms after final approval and that applicants receive and can sign these forms.

steps.description: Complete final approval and trigger contract/ABSA form availability
Account manager uploads contract and ABSA forms
Verify applicant receives notification/email with form links
Applicant accesses and digitally signs contract and ABSA forms
Check system records signatures and marks forms as completed

title: Workflow Pauses and Resumes on Manual Review with Notifications
description: Verify that workflow correctly pauses at manual review steps, sends notifications, and resumes automatically upon approval or denial without manual tracking.

steps.description: Trigger a manual review step requiring risk or account manager input
Confirm workflow status shows as paused
Verify email/SMS notifications are sent to assigned reviewers
Perform manual approval or denial action in system
Check workflow automatically resumes and advances accordingly
Ensure no manual override or tracking needed to resume workflow

title: Immediate Denial Handling and Notification
description: Test the workflow's immediate termination and notification process when an application is denied at any stage.

steps.description: Submit denial decision during quotation approval or risk review
Verify workflow transitions to denial state immediately
Check that denial notifications are sent promptly to applicant and all relevant managers
Confirm no further workflow events are processed after denial

title: Sequential and Parallel Workflow Step Execution Validation
description: Validate that the workflow engine enforces sequential and parallel processing correctly, preventing premature form requests or progress.

steps.description: Attempt to access forms or workflow stages out-of-sequence
Ensure access is blocked for unapproved or prerequisite steps
Complete sequential steps properly and verify transitions
Confirm parallel branches execute independently and workflow waits for all to finish

title: Notification Delivery Timing and Content Accuracy
description: Check that all notification messages (email/SMS) related to workflow events are sent timely with correct recipient, content, and context.

steps.description: Trigger key workflow events: quotation approval, form availability, manual review, denial, final approval
Validate receipt of notifications within expected timeframe
Verify that notifications contain accurate and relevant information for recipients

title: Logging Completeness and Dashboard Visibility
description: Verify all workflow steps, decisions, and errors are logged properly and visible on the monitoring dashboard for audit and transparency purposes.

steps.description: Execute a full end-to-end workflow with mixed decision outcomes
Check that each step and transition is recorded in logs
Validate that decisions, approvals, denials, and errors appear on the dashboard

title: Workflow Automation Rate and Completion Time Validation
description: Assert that standard cases achieve at least 80% automation and reduce overall workflow completion time by 30% compared to baseline.

steps.description: Run multiple standard onboarding cases through the workflow engine
Measure and report percentage of automated steps completed without manual intervention
Compare total workflow completion time against previous baseline and verify 30% reduction

title: Edge Case: Missing Mandatory Applicant Details
description: Verify system behavior when mandatory fields in applicant details are missing or invalid during initial input.

steps.description: Attempt to submit applicant details form with missing mandatory fields
Check that proper validation errors are displayed
Input invalid data formats (e.g., invalid email, phone)
Confirm form submission is blocked and user is prompted to correct errors

title: Error Handling for AI Service Failures
description: Test system's handling and user notification when AI services for quotation or document analysis fail or return errors.

steps.description: Simulate AI quotation service failure during applicant detail submission
Ensure system logs error and shows an informative message to user
Simulate AI document analysis failure after document submission
Verify workflow pauses or flags error state, notifies managers, and prevents incorrect approvals

title: Edge Case: Partial Completion of Parallel Workflow Branches
description: Verify that workflow correctly handles scenario where one parallel branch completes and another remains pending.

steps.description: Complete only one branch of the parallel mandate workflow
Observe that workflow remains paused until all parallel branches complete
Complete remaining branch
Confirm workflow resumes and progresses as expected

title: Edge Case: Applicant Attempts to Sign Expired Quote
description: Check system prevents signing of quotes after their validity period has expired and informs applicant appropriately.

steps.description: Simulate quote expiration by manipulating system time or quote expiry field
Applicant attempts to sign expired quote
Verify system blocks signing and displays expiration message

title: Form Validation on Facility Application and Mandate Documents
description: Ensure all forms enforce Zod-based validation schemas, including boundary cases and invalid data inputs.

steps.description: Fill facility application and mandate forms with valid data to confirm acceptance
Forms submit successfully without validation errors
Input invalid or boundary data values into each form field
Verify form validation catches all errors and prevents submission
